abstract: If Chevron succeeds, such an acquisition could help close the final chapter on the downfall of Russia’s largest oil company.
snippet: If Chevron succeeds, such an acquisition could help close the final chapter on the downfall of Russia’s largest oil company.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Feb. 8 — Chevron intends to bid for assets of Yukos, the bankrupt oil producer, Russian officials said Friday. If Chevron succeeds, such an acquisition could help close the final chapter on the downfall of Russia’s largest oil company.

headline.main: Chevron Said to Be Interested in Buying Assets of Yukos of Russia
headline.print_headline: Chevron Said to Be Interested in Buying Assets of Yukos of Russia
